pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot looking down into a dark, narrow, futuristic alleyway or chasm. Bright spotlights and red warning lights illuminate what appears to be heavy rain or snow falling between the industrial structures. The camera remains stationary, capturing the moody, atmospheric scene.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
